definition.name: crowdin-action
definition.description: This action allows you to manage and synchronize localization resources with your Crowdin project
definition.author: crowdin

inputs.name: upload_sources
inputs.description: Upload sources to Crowdin

inputs.name: upload_sources_args
inputs.description: Additional arguments which will be passed to the `upload sources` cli command

inputs.name: upload_translations
inputs.description: Upload translations to Crowdin

inputs.name: upload_language
inputs.description: Use this option to upload translations for a single specified language - Case-Sensitive

inputs.name: auto_approve_imported
inputs.description: Automatically approves uploaded translations

inputs.name: import_eq_suggestions
inputs.description: Defines whether to add translation if it is equal to source string in Crowdin project

inputs.name: upload_translations_args
inputs.description: Additional arguments which will be passed to the `upload translations` cli command

inputs.name: download_sources
inputs.description: Defines whether to download source files from the Crowdin project

inputs.name: push_sources
inputs.description: Push downloaded sources to the branch

inputs.name: download_sources_args
inputs.description: Additional arguments which will be passed to the `download sources` cli command

inputs.name: download_translations
inputs.description: Defines whether to download translation files from the Crowdin project

inputs.name: download_language
inputs.description: Use this option to download translations for a single specified language

inputs.name: download_bundle
inputs.description: Download bundle from Crowdin project (by ID)

inputs.name: skip_untranslated_strings
inputs.description: Skip untranslated strings in exported files (does not work with .docx, .html, .md and other document files)

inputs.name: skip_untranslated_files
inputs.description: Omit downloading not fully translated files

inputs.name: export_only_approved
inputs.description: Include approved translations only in exported files. If not combined with --skip-untranslated-strings option, strings without approval are fulfilled with the source language

inputs.name: push_translations
inputs.description: Push downloaded translations to the branch

inputs.name: commit_message
inputs.description: Commit message for download translations
inputs.default: New Crowdin translations by GitHub Action

inputs.name: localization_branch_name
inputs.description: To download translations to the specified version branch

inputs.name: create_pull_request
inputs.description: Create pull request after pushing to branch

inputs.name: pull_request_title
inputs.description: The title of the new pull request
inputs.default: New Crowdin translations by GitHub Action

inputs.name: pull_request_body
inputs.description: The contents of the pull request

inputs.name: pull_request_assignees
inputs.description: Add up to 10 assignees to the created pull request (separated by comma)

inputs.name: pull_request_reviewers
inputs.description: Usernames of people from whom a review is requested for this pull request (separated by comma)

inputs.name: pull_request_team_reviewers
inputs.description: Team slugs from which a review is requested for this pull request (separated by comma)

inputs.name: pull_request_labels
inputs.description: To add labels for created pull request

inputs.name: pull_request_base_branch_name
inputs.description: Create pull request to specified branch instead of default one

inputs.name: download_translations_args
inputs.description: Additional arguments which will be passed to the `download translations` cli command

inputs.name: skip_ref_checkout
inputs.description: Skip default git checkout on GITHUB_REF

inputs.name: crowdin_branch_name
inputs.description: Option to upload or download files to the specified version branch in your Crowdin project

inputs.name: config
inputs.description: Option to specify a path to the configuration file, without / at the beginning

inputs.name: dryrun_action
inputs.description: Option to preview the list of managed files

inputs.name: github_base_url
inputs.description: Option to configure the base URL of GitHub server, if using GHE.

inputs.name: github_api_base_url
inputs.description: Options to configure the base URL of GitHub server for API requests, if using GHE and different from api.github_base_url.

inputs.name: github_user_name
inputs.description: Option to configure GitHub user name on commits.

inputs.name: github_user_email
inputs.description: Option to configure GitHub user email on commits.

inputs.name: gpg_private_key
inputs.description: GPG private key in ASCII-armored format

inputs.name: gpg_passphrase
inputs.description: GPG Passphrase

inputs.name: project_id
inputs.description: Numerical ID of the project

inputs.name: token
inputs.description: Personal access token required for authentication

inputs.name: base_url
inputs.description: Base URL of Crowdin server for API requests execution

inputs.name: base_path
inputs.description: Path to your project directory on a local machine, without / at the beginning

inputs.name: source
inputs.description: Path to the source files, without / at the beginning

inputs.name: translation
inputs.description: Path to the translation files

inputs.name: command
inputs.description: Crowdin CLI command to execute

inputs.name: command_args
inputs.description: Additional arguments which will be passed to the Crowdin CLI command

outputs.name: pull_request_url
outputs.description: The URL of the pull request created by the workflow

outputs.name: pull_request_number
outputs.description: The number of the pull request created by the workflow

outputs.name: pull_request_created
outputs.description: Whether a new pull request was created (true) or an existing one was found (false)
